vuse-card-mini-widget.headline: Set hearline text with it.
vuse-card-mini-widget.avatar: You can set avatar image here
vuse-card-mini-widget.icon: If you don't have avatar, then it will look into icon that you set with this prop.
vuse-card-mini-widget.background: This will set background of the widget.
vuse-card-mini-widget.className: Additional classes that you want to set to the card.
vuse-card-mini-widget.dark: Based on the background you need to set text color.
vuse-card-mini-widget.rightIcon: To move the icon/avatar to right side and set the text in the left side
vuse-card-mini-widget.tile: In case if avatar, set tile to have tile effect on avatar
vuse-card-mini-widget.gradient: Choose gradient background for the card widget
vuse-card-mini-widget.height: Set the height of the widget. Default is 100px

vuse-action-card-widget.cardMedia: Source of media file for the v-card-media
vuse-action-card-widget.actions:
Action is the array of objects (in case of multiple action). This relates to v-card-action. An action object may have below elements:
Button position: {position: Boolean}. Default will be icon button.
Show as button: {btn: Boolean}
Color of button: {color: String}
Flat button: {flat: Boolean}
Round button: {round: Boolean}
Outline button: {outline: Boolean}
Small button: {outline: Boolean}
Dark: {dark: Boolean}
Event Emitter: {event: String} this event will be emitted on click of the button, so it can be handled at vuse-action-card-widget
vuse-action-card-widget.cardTitle: Refers to v-card-title's headline and detail. cardTitle: {headline: ', detail: '}

vuse-user-profile-widget.avatar: You can set avatar image here
vuse-user-profile-widget.name: Name of the user
vuse-user-profile-widget.dark: Based on the background you need to set text color.
vuse-user-profile-widget.gradient: Choose gradient background for the card widget
vuse-user-profile-widget.height: Set the height of the widget. Default is 400px
vuse-user-profile-widget.background: This will set background of the widget.
vuse-user-profile-widget.className: Additional classes that you want to set to the card.
vuse-user-profile-widget.avatarColor: Color of avatar background. In case you dont have avatar, it will set background for icon.
vuse-user-profile-widget.icon: Replacement of avatar if you have not set avatar media, you can set avatar icon.

vuse-card-mini-widget.click: Handle the click event on the component.

slots.actions: Slot to manage to card actions
